comment: It only seems to work once then any other texts that I get do not get an auto response from me. I need this for my business so can u please tell me why this is happening

title: Exception defect
comment: Quick Double click on enable checkbox will show defect

title: Great app!
comment: Perfect for sending text responses when you are too busy or just don't want to answer your phone. Works wonderfully on my Note 2.

title: It's working like a charm
comment: Have to use the aosp messaging apps tought..

title: Great
comment: Finally an app of this kind that actually works and doesn't look terrible.

title: Its awesome
comment: I think there could be a few more features, but its nice and simple and easy to use. I use it everytime I'm busy in class or violin practice. I think there should be a calendar for task that occur often on a scheduled block.  Edit: Holly crap its open sourced. I'm loving this thing more and more. Time to make a difference!

title: Great app.
comment: Could use a toggle widget though!

title: Good app but slight compatibility issue
comment: Auto-Away does exactly what it says on the tin - unless you have Go SMS installed. This may be the same with other third party SMS apps but I haven't tested any others.  I have emailed the dev so will see what he comes back with. I hope this can be resolved as I really like the functionality of Auto-Away but prefer Go SMS to the stock SMS app.  [Edit] After some back and forth with the dev he found the problem. If you go into GO SMS and disable the "Disable other message notification" feature it works perfectly. Changed review to 5* as well.

title: Crashes
comment: Atrix 4G crashes when edit away message is clicked.
+Adrian Basham, this should be fixed if you want to give it another go!

title: Auto-Away
comment: This programmer is the greatest. The features are rich and the program simple to use. Keep up the great work!!
